name: Events Calendar For Divi
author: wpt00ls

sections.installation:
How to install the Events Calendar For Divi plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload event-manager-for-divi folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Are there any dependencies for this plugin?

Yes, you need to have both “The Events Calendar” plugin and the Divi theme installed for our plugin to work properly.

How does your plugin integrate with The Events Calendar?

Our plugin seamlessly connects Divi and The Events Calendar, giving you the ability to design event pages, listings, carousels, and calendars with Divi’s builder.

Can I try the premium version before buying?

Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial of the premium version with no payment details required. You can explore all the features and decide if it’s the right fit for you.

Are there any pre-built layouts included?

Yes, we provide professionally designed Divi templates for single event pages and event listings. You can easily import them into the Divi Theme Builder.
For the wordpress.org version we offer 2 templates (1 for single event page and 1 for events listing page). For premium version we offer 15+ templates

What happens if I need help or run into issues?

We offer outstanding documentation to guide you through every step. Plus, our support team is always available to assist you with any questions or issues.

Is there a money-back guarantee?

Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee if you’re not satisfied with the premium version.
sections.changelog:
5.0.0

  • Added: Freemius integration
  • Released: Uploaded to WordPress.org

4.0.0

  • Added: Events calendar divi module to display events on a calendar

3.0.0

  • Added: Events divi module for events listing. Display events in a grid, list or carousel

2.0.0

  • Added: “Event Content” module for event page. Add breadcrumb, description, excerpt, back button, event notices, add to calendar button, details (date, time, cost, categories, tags), venue, organizers and map on an event page

1.0.0

  • Added: Project skeleton and scaffolding
sections.description:
Revolutionize event pages with Events Calendar For Divi. Elevate design and engage visitors effortlessly.

Transform Your Event Pages with “Events Calendar For Divi”

Do your event pages look generic and fail to showcase the true essence of your events? Event Manager for Divi is here to help you create standout, visually engaging event pages that leave a lasting impression.

Perfect for agencies, freelancers and single website owners, our plugin enhances your workflow and delivers visually impressive pages.

Transform your event pages today and create lasting impressions with ease.

With a quick setup, seamless divi integration and professionally designed single events page and event listing layout, this free version of plugin is ideal for users who want a simple events integration into their website.

For more advanced users, the premium version is recommended.

Our plugin offers essential tools to integrate The Events Calendar with the Divi Theme, making it easier to design event pages using the Divi Builder.

Key Features:

  • Single Event Page Layout: Create a professional-looking single event page using the free version’s Event Content module. Showcase event page with a simple, pre-designed layout. Add key event details such as:
    • Breadcrumbs
    • Event description and excerpt
    • Date, time, categories, cost, and tags
    • Venue details and Google Maps integration
    • Organizer information
    • “Add to Calendar” button
    • and more …
  • Events Listing Layout: Use the Events module to create an events listing page, either as a standalone page or as part of the Divi Theme Builder. Showcase events with a simple, pre-designed layout.

Single Event & Events Divi Pre-Built Divi Templates

We provide pre-designed Divi templates for both single event pages and event listings. You can download the templates using the links below. To use them, simply import the layout in WordPress Admin > Divi > Theme Builder and start building your event pages effortlessly.

  • Download Single Event Page Layout
  • Download Events Listing Page Layout

Limitations of the Free Version:

  • Styling Options: Limited customization options for styling the event pages.
  • Pre-Built Layouts: Access to only one basic single event layout and one events listing layout.
  • Events Calendar Module: : Showcases events in a calendar layout. This module is available in the premium version
  • Events Carousel Module: : Showcases events in a carousel. This module is available in the premium version
  • Advanced Features: The free version provides essential functionality but lacks the advanced features and flexibility offered in the premium version.

Why Upgrade to the Premium Version?

Unlock the full potential of The Events Calendar with seamless Divi Theme integration. Our premium version offers a comprehensive set of features designed to make your event pages look professional and engaging, while saving you time and effort.

Key Benefits:

  • Custom Event Pages: Use our beautifully designed pre-built layouts to create stunning event pages, event listings, carousels, and calendar views in minutes—no design skills required.
  • Full Divi Integration: Get versatile Divi modules with extensive styling options, allowing you to customize every aspect of your event pages.
  • Save Time: Import pre-designed templates straight into Divi Builder, giving you professionally designed pages without the hassle.
  • Stand Out: Create visually appealing, professional event pages that leave a lasting impression on your users.

Hassle-Free Trial and Guarantee:

  • 7-Day FREE Trial: Try all premium features risk-free, no payment information required.
  • 14-Day Money-Back Guarantee: If the premium version doesn’t meet your needs, you can request a full refund, no questions asked.

World-Class Support:

Our team is committed to helping you make the most of your events. Whether you need help with setup or customization, we’ve got you covered with priority support for premium users.

Comprehensive Documentation

We provide outstanding documentation to guide you through every step of using Event Manager for Divi. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced developer, our detailed instructions and examples will ensure you get the most out of the plugin. Craft beautiful, professional event pages with ease.
